devdoc.author: Legion
devdoc.details: Provides immutable values for time periods, denominators, and unique identifiers used throughout the protocol.

BASIS_POINTS_DENOMINATOR.details: Denominator for basis points calculations (10,000 where 1% = 100 bps).

LEGION_BOUNCER_ID.details: Unique identifier for the Legion Bouncer in the Address Registry.

LEGION_FEE_RECEIVER_ID.details: Unique identifier for the Legion Fee Receiver in the Address Registry.

LEGION_SIGNER_ID.details: Unique identifier for the Legion Signer in the Address Registry.

LEGION_VESTING_CONTROLLER_ID.details: Unique identifier for the Legion Vesting Controller in the Address Registry.

LEGION_VESTING_FACTORY_ID.details: Unique identifier for the Legion Vesting Factory in the Address Registry.

MAX_EPOCH_DURATION_SECONDS.details: Maximum duration allowed for an epoch, set to 52 weeks (1 year).

MAX_VESTING_DURATION_SECONDS.details: Maximum duration allowed for token vesting, set to 520 weeks (10 years).

MAX_VESTING_LOCKUP_SECONDS.details: Maximum duration allowed for lockup periods, set to 520 weeks (10 years).

TOKEN_ALLOCATION_RATE_DENOMINATOR.details: Denominator for token allocation rate calculations (1e18 for 18 decimal precision).

devdoc.title: Legion Constants Library

userdoc.notice: Stores constants shared across the Legion Protocol.
